english.query: Who is the Prime Minister of UAE?
english.response:
The United Arab Emirates (UAE) does not have a single Prime Minister. Instead, it has a President and several Deputy Presidents, as well as a Cabinet of ministers who are responsible for different ministries.
The current President of the UAE is Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, also known as MBZ. He has been in office since 2004 and is also the Emir of Abu Dhabi.
There is no traditional prime ministerial position in the UAE, but there are several deputy presidents who play important roles:
These individuals hold significant power and influence in their respective emirates, but they do not have the same level of authority as a prime minister in other countries.

arabic.query: من هو رئيس وزراء الإمارات العربية المتحدة؟
arabic.response:
The United Arab Emirates (UAE) does not have a single Prime Minister. Instead, it has a President and several Deputy Presidents, as well as a Cabinet of ministers who are responsible for different ministries.
The current President of the UAE is Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, also known as MBZ. He has been in office since 2004 and is also the Emir of Abu Dhabi.
There is no traditional prime ministerial position in the UAE, but there are several deputy presidents who play important roles:
These individuals hold significant power and influence in their respective emirates, but they do not have the same level of authority as a prime minister in other countries.
لا توجد رئاسة وزراء في الإمارات العربية المتحدة، ولكنها تحتوي على حكومة برئاسها.
تعد الإمارات العربية المتحدة دولة إمارة، حيث يعتمد الحكم على الإمارات المثبتة. يعيش الرئيس في Abu Dhabi، ويُنتخب من قبل المجلس التأسيسي (النوادي) الذي يكون متصلاً بملك UAE، والذي يكون President UAE.
أما عن من يحكم الإمارات العربية المتحدة، فهناك بعض الإمارات التي تحتوي على رؤساءها الذين يعتبرون themselves كخلفا لملك UAE:
هذان الرئيسان هما رئيسي إمارة UAE، والذي ينتخب President UAE.
أما عن من يحكم الإمارات العربية المتحدة في مستوى الأمن و internal matters، فهناك عدة رؤساء أمانة UAE، ويسموا باسم " Minister of Interior"، ومن بينهم:
هذان الرؤساء هما مسؤولون عن الأمن والسيطرة على الإمارات العربية المتحدة، ولكن ليس لديهم رئاسة وزراء.
